title: 'Delivering decisive action as directed': US releases new videos of strikes on Iran
summary_full: US and Israel have launched coordinated strikes targeting Iran's leadership, reportedly killing Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei and his family. Operation Epic Fury, led by Donald Trump, utilized advanced weaponry including stealth jets and Tomahawk missiles to dismantle Iran's missile capabilities. The US Central Command confirmed the extensive military operation.
